About Bubba's Bash

Bubba's Bash 2014

Created in 2012 by PGA Tour Pro and Master’s Champion Bubba Watson, Bubba’s Bash is a night of faith, fun and great music. Past Bubba’s Bash events have been held in Columbus, Ohio and Orlando, Florida and have featured a wide variety of artists and celebrity guests from Jordin Sparks, Josh Turner and Toby Mac, to Willie and Jase of A&E’s hit show, Duck Dynasty. This year’s bash will feature top Christian artists including headliner and Grammy Award winner, Lecrae, along with Andy Mineo, Britt Nicole, Thi’sl, and FEDEL. The Bash’s charitable connections are also rising to a new level this year with the newly formed Bubba Watson Foundation taking over as the primary presenter and beneficiary of the Bash… the 3rd annual Bubba’s Bash is sure to be the biggest and best yet!
